trans-unit.source: Provides a regular expression to parse an ASP.NET code block.
trans-unit.target: 提供規則運算式 (Regular Expression)，以剖析 ASP.NET 程式碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions.AspCodeRegex> class provides a compiled regular expression to parse an ASP.NET code block (`<%` …
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions.AspCodeRegex>類別提供已編譯的規則運算式剖析 ASP.NET 程式碼區塊 (`<%` ...

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions> classes are used internally by the .NET Framework to parse ASP.NET pages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions>類別用於在內部.NET Framework 所剖析的 ASP.NET 網頁。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.RegularExpressions.AspCodeRegex" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.RegularExpressions.AspCodeRegex" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.RegularExpressions.AspCodeRegex" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.RegularExpressions.AspCodeRegex" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor instantiates a compiled regular expression whose predefined regular expression pattern is `\G<%(?!@)(?<code>.*?)%>`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的預先定義的規則運算式模式所編譯的規則運算式會具現化`\G<%(?!@)(?<code>.*?)%>`。

trans-unit.source: A time-out interval, or <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" /> if matching operations should not time out.
trans-unit.target: 逾時間隔，如果比對作業不應該逾時，則為 <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.RegularExpressions.AspCodeRegex" /> class with a specified time-out value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的逾時值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.RegularExpressions.AspCodeRegex" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The `A_1` parameter represents the maximum time interval during which the regular expression engine tries to find a match before the operation times out and a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: `A_1`參數表示的最大時間間隔期間的規則運算式引擎會嘗試尋找相符項目，作業逾時之前，<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>擲回例外狀況。
